[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1602175740667{padding-top: 260px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/DSC_8772_edited-min-scaled.jpg?id=8081) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1513003956648{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1513004658055{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1513008591637{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Birthday Celebration” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Great%20Vibes%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_fixed_background=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602921700676{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/blue-white-bokeh-background-vector-6344567.jpg?id=7741) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Birthday Celebration” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

Birthdays are always filled with Amazing Memories and Happiness no matter if it’s the 1st birthday of your child or the 18th birthday of a person or if it’s that important year of a person’s life that is 50th birthday. Today everyone wants to celebrate their birthday in a fantastic style unique from others in terms of decoration, entertainment, or unique food items. Everyone wants to showcase this special day in a memorable and unique manner

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8083″ img_size=”large” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602921553783{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/14396-white-background-design.jpg?id=7969) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8273″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Archi Events ?” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight”]

Archi Events is a one for all that your birthday event needs. From offering you a multiple balloon decoration idea, multitude of party ideas, supplying the material to managing the party needs with personal supervision as an advantage. At Archi Event we ensure that planning and executing your birthday event is a fun and memorable experience for you. Working with our birthday planners, you will realize that your birthday party is just a “piece of cake” Just as every individual is unique and so is there birthday celebration and with that vision in mind we spend time with you in the meeting to understand your interest and party package accordingly. So whether it’s a Doraemon theme or Avenger, A simple yet elegant birthday Decoration or a heavy décor with a touch of class, we at Archi Events are here for you to manage it. So just sit back and relax and let us handle your birthday celebration.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602921630383{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/beautiful-white-lovely-background-with-papercut-style_112769-295.jpg?id=7825) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Services We Provide” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

  • Birthday Themes
  • Balloon Decoration
  • Amazing Cake Cutting Concepts
  • Special Birthday Food Items
  • Fix Entertainment
  • Live Entertainment
  • Mascot
  • Virtual Games
  • Photography
  • Foreign Live Entertainment
  • Catering & Food preparation
  • Venue Selection
  • And Many More Services …………

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”90px”][vc_single_image image=”8277″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
